entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Red Deer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -13.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Deer Regional Airport 04:00 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -13.8°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -15.7°C
Wind: SSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022
